meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before the appearance of humans.
meanings.sent1: The ancient bones belonged to a prehuman creature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study prehuman fossils to learn about our past.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a humorous prehuman exhibit.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the forest was described as a prehuman realm.
meanings.sent5: The prehuman world was depicted in vivid cave paintings.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a time before humans existed.
meanings.sent1: The prehuman landscape was untouched by civilization.
meanings.sent2: The researchers discovered prehuman artifacts buried deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed a quirky prehuman society.
meanings.sent4: The ruins hinted at a prehuman civilization lost to time.
meanings.sent5: Legends spoke of a prehuman era filled with mystery.
